Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Jimmy Butler?

Jimmy Butler is 36 years old.

Where was Jimmy Butler born?

Jimmy Butler was born in Houston, Texas.

When was Jimmy Butler born?

Jimmy Butler was born on September 14, 1989.

How tall is Jimmy Butler?

Jimmy Butler is 6-7 (201 cm) tall.

How much does Jimmy Butler weigh?

Jimmy Butler weighs 230 lbs (104 kg).

Is Jimmy Butler in the Hall of Fame?

Jimmy Butler is not in the Hall of Fame.

When was Jimmy Butler drafted?

Jimmy Butler was drafted by Chicago Bulls, 1st round (30th pick, 30th overall), 2011 NBA Draft.

What position does Jimmy Butler play?

Small Forward, Shooting Guard, and Power Forward.

What is Jimmy Butler's net worth?

Jimmy Butler has made at least $312,572,403 playing professional basketball.

How much does Jimmy Butler make?

Jimmy Butler made $48,798,677 in 2025.

What does Jimmy Butler average?

Jimmy Butler averages 20.1 points, 5.5 rebounds, and 4.7 assists per game.

How many rings does Jimmy Butler have?

Jimmy Butler has won 0 championships.

What is Jimmy Butler's Instagram account?

Jimmy Butler is on Instagram at jimmybutler.

What schools did Jimmy Butler attend?

Jimmy Butler attended Tomball in Tomball, Texas, Tyler Junior College and Marquette.

What are Jimmy Butler's nicknames?

Jimmy G. Buckets, Himmy Butler, Playoff Jimmy are nicknames for Jimmy Butler.

Is Jimmy Butler injured?

Jimmy Butler is listed as Day To Day (Back) - Butler did not play in Wednesday's (Nov. 19) game against the Heat.
